mapper.update:
update t_offline_oper
E_HR = #{eHr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_UPDATE = #{createUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CS_SUBDEPT_ID = #{csSubdeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RM_ID = #{rmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RM_NAME = #{rmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHSOFTI_MSK_HOURS = #{chsoftiMskHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_AW_HOURS = #{chsoftiAwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_IW_HOURS = #{chsoftiIwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_OT_HOURS = #{chsoftiOtHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_TO_HOURS = #{chsoftiToHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_APW_HOURS = #{chsoftiApwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_IFAW = #{chsoftiIfaw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INVALID = #{chsoftiInvalid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INF_OT = #{chsoftiInfOt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INF_PT = #{chsoftiInfPt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INF_AD = #{chsoftiInfAd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INF_TRAVEL = #{chsoftiInfTravel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INF_EQUIPMENT = #{chsoftiInfEquipment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INF_SUB = #{chsoftiInfSub,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INF_TOTAL = #{chsoftiInfTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INF_CURRENT = #{chsoftiInfCurrent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_EFFECTIVE_NR = #{chsoftiEffectiveNr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_EFFECTIVE_ST = #{chsoftiEffectiveSt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHSOFTI_INVALID_ST = #{chsoftiInvalidSt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_offline_oper set E_HR = #{eHr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_UPDATE = #{createUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CS_SUBDEPT_ID = #{csSubdeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RM_ID = #{rmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RM_NAME = #{rmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHSOFTI_MSK_HOURS = #{chsoftiMskHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_AW_HOURS = #{chsoftiAwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_IW_HOURS = #{chsoftiIwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_OT_HOURS = #{chsoftiOtHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_TO_HOURS = #{chsoftiToHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_APW_HOURS = #{chsoftiApwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_IFAW = #{chsoftiIfaw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INVALID = #{chsoftiInvalid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_OT = #{chsoftiInfOt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_PT = #{chsoftiInfPt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_AD = #{chsoftiInfAd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_TRAVEL = #{chsoftiInfTravel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_EQUIPMENT = #{chsoftiInfEquipment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_SUB = #{chsoftiInfSub,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_TOTAL = #{chsoftiInfTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_CURRENT = #{chsoftiInfCurrent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_EFFECTIVE_NR = #{chsoftiEffectiveNr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_EFFECTIVE_ST = #{chsoftiEffectiveSt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INVALID_ST = #{chsoftiInvalidSt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_offline_oper set E_HR = #{eHr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_UPDATE = #{createUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CS_SUBDEPT_ID = #{csSubdeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RM_ID = #{rmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RM_NAME = #{rmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHSOFTI_MSK_HOURS = #{chsoftiMskHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_AW_HOURS = #{chsoftiAwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_IW_HOURS = #{chsoftiIwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_OT_HOURS = #{chsoftiOtHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_TO_HOURS = #{chsoftiToHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_APW_HOURS = #{chsoftiApwHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_IFAW = #{chsoftiIfaw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INVALID = #{chsoftiInvalid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_OT = #{chsoftiInfOt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_PT = #{chsoftiInfPt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_AD = #{chsoftiInfAd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_TRAVEL = #{chsoftiInfTravel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_EQUIPMENT = #{chsoftiInfEquipment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_SUB = #{chsoftiInfSub,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_TOTAL = #{chsoftiInfTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INF_CURRENT = #{chsoftiInfCurrent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_EFFECTIVE_NR = #{chsoftiEffectiveNr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_EFFECTIVE_ST = #{chsoftiEffectiveSt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHSOFTI_INVALID_ST = #{chsoftiInvalidSt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) From t_offline_oper WHERE YEAR = #{year} and MONTH = #{month} and RM_ID = #{rmId}
SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE user_type='5' AND FIND_IN_SET( #{subDeptId},CSDEPT_ID )>0
